name: Neural Signal Processing and Data Analysis

semesters.prerequisite: Multivariable Calculus; Linear Algebra:  basic matrix operations (sums and products), matrix inversion, eigenvectors and eigenvalues, singular value decomposition; Probability Theory and Mathematical Statistics: independence, conditional probability, Bayes rule, multivariate Gaussian distribution, Poisson distribution, Poisson process
semesters.evaluation: Attendance/In class quiz (5%), Midterm exam (30%), Final exam (30%), Projects (35%): Proposal (5%, due Week 4), Progress report & presentation (10%, due Week 8), Final report & presentation (20%, due Week 14)
